docs.snippet: “Text neck” is becoming a medical issue suffered by countless people, and the way we hang our heads has other health risks, too.

headline.main: Keep Your Head Up: How Smartphone Addiction Kills Manners and Moods

docs.snippet: There is no reliable cure for angry young men who harbor violent fantasies. The only solution is to keep guns out of their hands.
